meanings.definition: A person who gives up easily or stops trying.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a quitter when it comes to challenges.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a quitter, keep pushing forward!
meanings.sent3: The quitter in the race decided to sit down and have a snack instead.
meanings.sent4: Being a quitter is like stopping a movie halfway through.
meanings.sent5: The image of a quitter is someone dropping their bags and walking away.

meanings.definition: To abandon a task or goal before it is completed.
meanings.sent1: I tend to quitter when things get tough.
meanings.sent2: Please don't quitter on your dreams.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to quitter chasing the mouse and took a nap instead.
meanings.sent4: Sometimes it's easier to quitter than to face the challenge head-on.
meanings.sent5: The decision to quitter can sometimes lead to regret later on.
